resources.string: RCN Digital is one of the largest Cable distribution company with a strong emphasis on quality of service and content. This has enabled us to cater to a large number of subscribers who are spread across varied locations in 50 towns across Amravati District in a very short span of time. With fiber optic backbone across its networks and state-of-the-art distribution set ups, we bring the digital age through Cable transforming the way viewers receive information and entertainment. RCN Digital success can be attributed to the experience of its promoters and management who are veterans in the field of cable TV technology. RCN to RCN digital, a journey of more than 10 years led us to transform ourselves to compete and meet the needed technology requisite of our valued customers and subscribers.

TERMS OF SERVICE

Please read this document carefully before using this app. This license provides important information concerning the app. 

1.All the questions and information provided in this app are gathered from various resources including internet and we do not express any ownership of these, although we have taken extra care to keep the information accurate but we not take the responsibility in case of any faulty information or question. 

2.In this free app advertisements will be shown, when you click on advertisement you will be redirected to a third party's webpage and they may use certain of your information, including your email address, phone number and a list of apps on your device.TERMS OF SERVICE
